channel.title: Go Humble! RSS SOFTWARE
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle software bundles!

item.title: Battle Hardened Game Asset Bundle by Hivemind
item.content:encoded: Customize your next big action set piece with the ultimate collection of battle-hardened game assets by Hivemind! Light up the sky with realistic gun effects and set the perfect war scene in any era of history you choose—get the Townsmith: Modular Medieval Town Megapack, Modular Military Base Megapack, Ultimate Spaceship System, and much more. Create the realism of war with the very best battle-hardened game assets and help support the miracle workers at Make-A-Wish with your purchase.

item.title: Polygon Assets by Animpic Studio
item.content:encoded: Looking for a little help to build your digital world? Get an instant library of flexible, lightweight, low-polygon assets, perfect for any game. Whether you’re trying to create a moody, atmospheric sci-fi adventure (Poly Style Mega Sci-Fi Sandbox) or a dangerous and dark survival horror adventure (Mega Survival Kit), there’s something here for every kind of game. Vehicles, city-scapes, fantasy villages, medieval camps—it’s all here waiting for your creativity. Plus, your purchase helps support Save the Children!

item.title: Battlefield Frontlines
item.description: Lead the charge - Take the wheel and build the battlefield.
item.content:encoded: Battlefield Frontlines is a massive collaboration between Dekogon Studios and Evolve Studios, valued at over $5,000 USD in professional Unreal Engine 5 assets licensed for full commercial use. This premium collection brings together 90+ top-rated Fab packs built for creating realistic military, survival, and post-conflict worlds. From drivable tanks and vehicles to modular bases, safe houses, industrial props, and urban ruins, every asset has been curated for cinematic quality and game-ready performance. Whether you’re designing a modern warzone, a fortified base, or a survivor’s last stand, Battlefield Frontlines gives you everything you need to build, battle, and command the ultimate combat environment—fully optimized for Nanite and Unreal Engine 5. Get the very best war assets and help support Trees, Water & People with your purchase!

item.title: Top Notch Unity Assets by Chris West
item.description: Massive savings on breathtaking Unity assets
item.content:encoded: The Top Notch Unity Assets Bundle is here to help you create effortlessly. Streamline the development process behind your next project with a curated bundle of ready-to-use Unity assets by Chris West. Save time and money with beautiful and practical prefabricated asset packs like the Full Sail collection—the ultimate tool for realistic movement on sails and other cloth-like objects—and Texture Studio, the perfect rendering platform for clothing, buildings, and more. Pay what you want for the very best from Chris West and help support the Make-A-Wish Foundation with your purchase.

item.title: Bundle Big Royalty-Free Music
item.description: The sweet sounds of royalty-free music
item.content:encoded: Set the right tone for your next game with the perfect mix of music. We've teamed up with Dark Fantasy Studio for our latest royalty-free music bundle! Get 29 albums and over 400 tracks, including .wav, .mp3, and seamless premium licenses for music such as Shadows Guild, Superheroes, Dreamagination, and Slasher. Enjoy big-time savings on the best music collection around and help support Prevent Cancer with your purchase.

item.title: Learn Claude Code and AI Development in 2026
item.content:encoded: Pay what you want to add the newest coding skills to your toolbelt with the 2026 Claude Code and AI Development Bundle. Learn from specialized courses like Prompt Engineering for Programmers and Learn Vibe Coding with Cursor alongside your mainline Claude Coding lesson plan. Claude is an automated coding agent you can use to help create original code, check your work, and save you from spending countless hours overworking yourself. Harness the ultra-powerful techniques of this amazing Humble Software Bundle and help support Girls Who Code with your purchase.

item.title: Anyone Can Learn to Code
item.content:encoded: Interested in learning about the intersection of game development and the rapidly advancing technologies driving AI? This bundle of video courses from Mammoth Interactive will get you up to speed! Learn how to implement, manage, and optimize large language models like GPT with the cutting edge toolkit Ollama. Drill down on the basics of popular game engines like Unity, Unreal, and Godot, hone your programming skills in languages like JavaScript and Python, and much more! Pay what you want for this bundle of over 40 comprehensive courses and help support starlight children’s foundation with your purchase!

item.title: The Complete Networking Bundle by Packt
item.content:encoded: Building any network comes with risk, from malware to denial-of-service attacks, and knowing how to shield your personal or team data is basically a full-time job. To help you turn your collection of programs into an impenetrable fortress, we’ve partnered with Packt to bring you the complete bundle of networking and cybersecurity courses for an unbelievably low price. Think of this bundle of guides and video courses as the ultimate boot camp, with topics ranging from exam training for CCNA, CCST, and ENCOR, information on building advanced network topologies, and crash courses on Azure and GitHub. Everything in this bundle comes straight from the experts, so act now to get it all at the price of your choosing, and support women and children in poverty with Lotus Outreach International.

item.title: Design Unlimited Bundle Encore
item.content:encoded: Calling all creatives and graphic designers—bring your vision to life without restrictions using CorelDRAW! Get professional graphic design software with vector, technical illustration, and CAD options to create logos, posters, drafts, and more. Level up your creative skills with elite software, and help support the Trees, Water & People with your purchase.

item.title: Ultimate Survival Asset Kit
item.content:encoded:
Step aside, T-Virus—a new competitor in the zombie genre is entering the scene. Start creating your own heart-pumping games with the Ultimate Survival Asset Kit! Get everything you need to bring your original post-apocalyptic world to fruition with assets that pop—pay what you want for haunting forest environments, gushing zombie brains, a variety of infected characters, and countless other assets to help bring your very much dead setting to life. Don’t wait—get these assets before you become infected and help support Girls Who Code with your purchase.

Keys expire. Please redeem all titles before February 9th, 2027.

item.title: Game Dev Station presents The Mega Game Dev Education Bundle
item.content:encoded: Sharpen your game development skills with a collection of curated learning paths. This flexible bundle by Game Dev Station has everything your game needs to succeed, with courses covering game testing, narrative design, procedural world generation, and project management. Whether you want to strengthen technical skills, become a better creative writer, or improve team efficiency, this bundle lets you combine the expertise that matters most to you. Pay what you want to polish your skills as a game developer and help support Save the Children when you learn with Humble.

item.title: Make Music, Change Lives
item.content:encoded:
It’s not easy to compose the perfect piece, but an asset library full of beats, clips, and instruments certainly helps. Our latest bundle has the ideal mix of sound files and melodies that span every genre you can think up, from orchestral epics to house beats to the cyberpunk trills of the future. Inside you’ll find looping synths, organs, guitars, and even a ukulele ensemble alongside a variety of genres like cumbia, R&B, funk, and alt rock—perfect for crafting the fitting atmospheres for all your creative projects.

Valued at roughly $970, this collection includes well over 10,000 loops, samples, and MIDI files for your productions. Soundtrack Loops contributes 7,559 professionally produced sounds, and at the top-tier bundle, the included Mixcraft DAW adds thousands more instruments, effects, and loops you can use to build full arrangements. Everything is royalty-free and ready for use in popular music software.

You choose what you pay to make the sound you’re looking for—and help fund student music programs with Music Will through your purchase!

item.title: Applied Acoustics Sound Designer Bundle
item.content:encoded: Create the perfect audioscape for your game, film, or creative project with the ultimate bundle for sound designers and engineers. Unlock 20+ unique and specialized audio packs like the soothing Lounge Lizard Session pack, the retro-inspired Ultra Analog Session pack, the foot-tapping Tabby Dance pack, and so much more. Pay what you want for this curated collection of professional-quality audio assets and help support the Malala Fund with your purchase.

item.title: Character and Creature Megabundle
item.content:encoded: Compelling casts of characters make or break a project—and we’re here to help you master character creation with a Megabundle of assets, tools, and techniques. This high-quality collection from Learn Squared features hot courses like Designing Better Characters and 3D Character Art, and will teach you how to get the most out of trusted industry design platforms like ZBrush to give your work professional-level polish. Pay what you want for the assets you need to bring life to your original characters, and help support Girls Who Code with your purchase!

item.title: Audio Alchemy: A Premium Collection of Sound FX, Music, and Game Engine Plugins from Ovani Sound Encore
item.description: Audio alchemy with no strings attached
item.content:encoded: Create the perfect audioscape for your next game or creative project with the Audio Alchemy Bundle of subscription-free sounds from Ovani Sound. Highlights from this extensive library of commercial-ready assets include Animals Sound FX Pack, Short Phrases Voice Over Pack, Epic Music Pack Vol. 2, and more! Explore a variety of genres, from lo-fi to classical and everything in between. Get the assets you need to achieve the sound you’re looking for, and support Children's Miracle Network Hospitals with your purchase!

item.title: The Complete 2026 Coding, AI, and GameDev Everything Bundle
item.description: The complete 2026 coding and AI collection
item.content:encoded: Get The Complete 2026 Coding, AI, and GameDev Everything Bundle and discover what possibilities await you within these red-hot fields. This curated collection of industry-standard courses from Mammoth Club, like Multiplayer Lobby with Chat – Godot 4.6 3D Game Template and Animation Fundamentals: Keyframing, Blendspaces & Sequencer in Unreal 5.7, lays the groundwork for you to learn the fundamentals. Gain the expert-led instruction and knowledge you need to succeed, and help support Little Free Library when you upgrade your skill sets with Humble.

item.title: Make Your Own Games In Unreal 2026
item.description: From gamer to developer with ease
item.content:encoded: Go from gamer to developer with the Make Your Own Games in Unreal Bundle! We’ve partnered with GameDev.tv to curate a library of courses and exams to streamline your progress and help you succeed in making RPGs, action games, and beyond. Get easy-to-understand courses like Unreal 5 C++ Developer Course: Project Shooter Sam, Unreal Engine Blueprint Game Developer Course, Unreal Engine 5: Build a Complete Survival Game with Blueprint Course, and more to help you master the fundamentals of game development. Unlock new possibilities and help support Trees, Water & People with your purchase.

item.title: Vibe Coding for the Future: Intelligent App Creation
item.content:encoded: Add new skills to your tech toolbelt with the Vibe Coding Bundle by Packt—the technique that blends AI and the development process to streamline your work and create no-code web applications! Learn from eCourses Vibe Coding Bootcamp, Make Apps with ChatGPT and Generative AI, and 10+ other can’t-miss lessons on your way to becoming a vibe-y all-star. Catch a coding vibe and help support buildOn when you level up your skills with Humble Bundle.

item.title: Manager's Toolkit by Packt
item.description: Lead processes and people with confidence
item.content:encoded: Pay what you want to take your career to the next level and become a leader of people and processes with the Manager’s Toolkit Bundle. Master fundamental systems like Microsoft 365, or even take on new responsibilities as a scrum master with personalized lesson plans like Microsoft Excel 365 – Beginner to Advanced, The AI-Enhanced Scrum Master – Automate, Analyse, and Accelerate Agile Workflow, and more. Strengthen your leadership skills and learn how to get the most out of your team today!
